question: 221. Which of the following databases do not support a read replica setup? (Choose two.)
222. Which of the following statements about DynamoDB are true? (Choose two.)
options: C. DynamoDB databases can scale up without needing a bigger underlying instance.
D. DynamoDB instance sizes are selected at runtime.
answers: C. DynamoDB databases can scale up without needing a bigger underlying instance.

question: 223. Which of the following statements about DynamoDB are true? (Choose two.)
options: A. DynamoDB is more difficult to scale than RDS.
C. DynamoDB is spread across at least three regions.
answers: C. DynamoDB is spread across at least three regions.

question: 224. What is the default consistency model for DynamoDB?
225. Which of the following are supported consistency models for DynamoDB? (Choose two.)

226. You are a solutions architect for a data-driven company using DynamoDB. They want to ensure always-accurate responses, so they have enabled strongly consistent reads. However, API calls to read data sometimes do not immediately return, and sometimes fail. What possible causes could there be? (Choose two.)
options: A. A recent write was made and is not yet complete. As a result, a read operation is delayed waiting on the write operation to complete.
B. A recent write was made and is replicating to the secondary instance. Until that replication completes, the read operation will lag.
D. A network outage has interrupted a recent write, and subsequent reads of that data are delayed as a result.
C. A network outage has interrupted a recent read, and subsequent reads of that data are delayed as a result.
answers: A. A recent write was made and is not yet complete. As a result, a read operation is delayed waiting on the write operation to complete.
D. A network outage has interrupted a recent write, and subsequent reads of that data are delayed as a result.

question: 227. Which of the following is a valid VPC configuration?
options: A. A single public subnet without any private subnets
C. A single public subnet with two private subnets
B. A single private subnet without any public subnets

question: 228. Which of the following are assigned to an EC2 instance in a default VPC? (Choose two.)
options: C. An internal AWS-only IP address

question: 229. Which of the following can an EC2 instance in a public VPC be assigned? (Choose two.)
230. Which of the following can you peer a VPC in your AWS account with? (Choose two.)
options: C. A VPC in another AWS account
B. Another VPC in your account
D. A public subnet in another AWS account
answers: C. A VPC in another AWS account
B. Another VPC in your account

options: B. Via HTTP request and response codes

239. Which of the following are true? (Choose two.)
options: A. SNS and SQS are interchangeable at an API level.
B. SNS is a pull-based system while SQS is a push-based system.
C. SNS manages notifications and SQS manages messages.
D. SNS is a push-based system while SQS is a pull-based system.
answers: D. SNS is a push-based system while SQS is a pull-based system.
